query:
SELECT 
  pd.code AS codigo_documento,
  pd.title AS titulo,
  pd.document_type AS tipo,
  dr.revision_number AS revisao_atual,
  dr.approved_at AS data_aprovacao,
  DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) AS dias_desde_aprovacao,
  CASE 
    WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) > 180 THEN 'CRÍTICO'
    WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) > 90 THEN 'ALTO'
    WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) > 60 THEN 'MÉDIO'
    ELSE 'BAIXO'
  END AS nivel_urgencia
FROM project_documents pd
INNER JOIN document_revisions dr ON pd.current_revision_id = dr.id
WHERE dr.status = 'approved'
  AND DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) > 30
  AND pd.status = 'active'
ORDER BY dias_desde_aprovacao DESC;

  pd.code AS codigo_documento,
  pd.title AS titulo,
  pd.document_type AS tipo,
  dr.revision_number AS revisao_atual,
  dr.approved_at AS data_aprovacao,
  DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) AS dias_desde_aprovacao,
  CASE 
    WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) > 180 THEN 'CRÍTICO'
    WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) > 90 THEN 'ALTO'
    WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) > 60 THEN 'MÉDIO'
    ELSE 'BAIXO'
  END AS nivel_urgencia
FROM project_documents pd
INNER JOIN document_revisions dr ON pd.current_revision_id = dr.id
WHERE dr.status = 'approved'
  AND DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), dr.approved_at) > 30
  AND pd.status = 'active'
ORDER BY dias_desde_aprovacao DESC;
